value.fullName: Yes, I typically prefer to study primarily in my room with limited distractions in a quiet atmosphere.

value.fullName: No, I am not distracted by visitors or music when studying in my room.

value.fullName: No preference, I will likely find a space to study outside of my room if I am being disturbed by others.
